description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 八號西北烈風或暴風信號

2025-09-23T14:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of No. 8 Northwest Gale or Storm Signal and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.

2025-09-24T18:55:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O : Motorists heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that all lanes of the Cross Bay Bridge have been re-opened. Motorists are requested to drive with care and pay attention to direction of the Police.
2025-09-24T18:55:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，將軍澳跨灣大橋現已實施下列交通及運輸安排: 前往跨灣大橋駕駛人士請注意，跨灣大橋全線已經重開。 駕駛人士請盡量忍讓及留意警務人員的指示。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 道路水浸風險特別提示

2025-09-24T01:05:00.CONTENT_EN: According to Hong Kong Observatory's prediction, storm surge will occur on 24 September early morning due to the effect of Super Typhoon Ragasa. The water level of Sha Tin Shing Mun River, Tai Po Lam Tsuen River and Tai Po River will rise and may exceed the river bank resulting in flooding at riverside areas' footpaths, cycle track and the nearby subways. Citizen shall avoid routing through flood-prone areas and stay away from watercourses.
2025-09-24T01:05:00.CONTENT_CN: 根據天文台的預測，因受超強颱風樺加沙影響，風暴潮預計於9月24日清晨出現。沙田城門河、大埔林村河及大埔河的水位有可能會超出河堤而引致河畔一帶行人路、單車徑及附近的隧道出現水浸。市民應遠離河道，並儘量避免途經有關地點。

2025-09-24T01:47:00.CONTENT_EN: The Hong Kong Observatory has announced that Typhoon Signal 9 is now issued. Before your journey, please check your train information through 12306 official website (12306. cn), mobile app or High Speed Rail website ; please attention to road or traffic conditions, and allow more time to travel to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. If you purchased your ticket through the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and would like to make changes to your journey, you may change the booking or obtain a ticket refund up to 45 minutes before the train departure time using the original purchase process.
2025-09-24T01:47:00.CONTENT_CN:
香港天文台公佈9號風球現正生效。 出發前，請在12306官方網站(12306.cn)、手機應用程式或高速鐵路網頁查閱 
有關班次的資料，留意路面或交通情況的最新公佈消息，並預留額外時間前往香港西九龍站。 乘客如果之前透過12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式購買高鐵車票，如果想更改行程，可以透過12306平台，在列車出發前45分鐘辦理更改或取消車次。

2025-09-24T15:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-09-24T15:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。
